original: Navipākaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca navipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe….

analyzed: ▁ navipākadhamma dhamm aṃ ▁paṭicca ▁ navipākadhamma dhamm o ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁pe
